QuestData.Title: Maximizing Resources
QuestData.Description:
Let me tell you a thing about my employees.
They're always blowing things out of proportion! I give them a good job with a steady wage and what do they do? They try to make excuses as to why they can't work!
They say the trees have come alive. Trees? Walking and fighting? If you're going to lie, at least make it more believable.
If they want to convince me, I'm going to need cold hard proof.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Wood-Adorned Skulls in Algerson Lumber Yard.
QuestData.CompletionText: I give them an honest job with good pay. This is the thanks I get?
QuestData.RewardText: <Algerson examines the skull.>$b$bNow this... this is something! Why are my workers running, they should be harvesting!$b$bWe could make a killing with these!
